name: THE Randoms
description:
THE Randoms is a simple Chrome extension that opens a popup version of the website THE Randoms. From the popup, you can instantly explore random quizzes, jokes, facts, quotes, numbers, letters, and more. You can also expand the popup into a full-page view for a bigger experience.
This extension does not modify your browsing, inject ads, or collect personal data. It simply gives you a faster, convenient way to explore fun and random content.
